nodes.text: The painting of the Mortis gods was an image of the Mortis Force wielders, the Daughter, Father, and Son, on the Lothal Jedi Temple. The painting served as a portal to the World Between Worlds. The Jedi Ezra Bridger used a key stone given to him by Loth-wolves to decrypt the painting, and used the Force on the painting to open the portal, and later close it.
